ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... a ... What makes people complaining about overcrowding at lower levels not a legitimate problem?  Perhaps you should get off your high horse, and realize
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Either way the prohblem of the matter is you have people complaining over
a
> legititment problem and then you have people complaining they never get
> something new. So I'll put this simple see the diffrence? See who deserves
> the change?

What makes people complaining about overcrowding at lower levels not a
legitimate problem? Perhaps you should get off your high horse, and realize
you're not the only person playing the game experiencing troubles with it.

Anyway, this is another off topic thread I hate weeding through so I'm not
gonna continue it anymore. :)
